text: Hi, is there a simple way to use the list API to fetch all contacts in it? (we are not using the membership functionality)

I'm not sure what you mean by not using the membership functionality but the only way to pull the data from the list API is to use the  `GET /crm/v3/lists/{listId}/memberships` API and page through its results. The list definition is separated from the data contained in the lists.
